formalText: She's tired and cranky and not feeling well.

She was telling Dave she was really frustrated that she couldn't get to sleep because this is so stupid.

He woke her up less than an hour after she finally dropped off to ask her to move over cuz she was taking up too much space in the bed and then she did not get back to sleep at all that night. He woke her up at 5 and then she was just up. She couldn't get back to bed when he finally rolled out of bed at 8:30.
She was like that was totally unfair don't ever do that again.
He just went off at her and yelled at her about how she wasn't doing anything about her sleep problems.
And he had told her to try vitamin D because that would fix her sleep problem.
She started yelling that she didn't want to try this vitamin D thing and she was like, well, you're suggesting that I take something like 12 times FDA recommended allowance of vitamin D.
She really doesn't want to take 12 times FDA recommended vitamin without medical supervision.

He told her she was selfish and she wasn't thinking about his feelings and he wish that he could believe that she loved him, but he can't because if she did, she wouldn't be thinking about suicide and it would destroy his world.
Things have been rough with her and Dave and she doesn't know what to do about it because she knows living with her isn't easy.
